data.eml:eml: Aradidae from Vietnam I. Two new genera of micropterous Mezirinae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Aradidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Heiss, Ernst (2013): Aradidae from Vietnam I. Two new genera of micropterous Mezirinae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Aradidae). Zootaxa 3694 (6): 587-595, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3694.6.6
